titleStmt.title: A pious collection of severall profitable directions fitted for the English Poore Clares in graveling in order to the better observance of their institute. Very usefull and profitable for all religious women.

notesStmt.note: On verso of title page: Imprimatur, .. Novembris 1684.
Copy has pgs. 9 and 10 misprinted; pg. 183 printed twice.
Reproduction of the original at the Bodleian Library.
